actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend title VII of the Public Health Service Act to provide fellowships in geriatric psychiatry, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to allow projects which focus on training physicians and dentists who plan to teach geriatric medicine or geriatric dentistry to: (1) be staffed by full-time teaching physicians with experience or training in geriatric psychiatry; (2) be based in a graduate medical education program in psychiatry; and (3) offer a one- or two-year psychiatry fellowship program with emphasis in geriatrics.

titles.title: A bill to amend title VII of the Public Health Service Act to provide fellowships in geriatric psychiatry, and for other purposes.
